name: Programmatore edi siti web in 41 ore: il pacchetto di corsi a 30 euro
description: Diventare programmatore esperto di siti web è possibile con il Do-It-All Dev Bundle in offerta su StackSocial: ora a 30 euro.
content:
In offerta il pacchetto di corsi pensati per principianti che insegnano a programmare siti web con destrezza in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript ed altri interessanti linguaggi: ora a 30 euro

Bastano poco più di 40 ore per diventare maghi dei siti web. Questo quanto promette il pacchetto di corsi (in inglese) denominato Do-It-All Dev Bundle attualmente in offerta su StackSocial che in meno di due giorni insegna come costruire un sito web partendo da zero anche all’utente completamente estraneo al mondo della programmazione.

HTML5, CSS3, Java Script e molto altro ancora vengono presi in considerazione singolarmente in modo da offrire una panoramica approfondita e completa in modo da lasciare l’utente pronto per muovere i propri passi in maniera autonoma non appena avrà completato i corsi. Ciascuno di essi (7 in tutto) si focalizza su un determinato linguaggio o argomento: il primo ad esempio, in 115 lezioni per un totale di 9 ore è pensato per principianti e orienta la programmazione ad oggetti, classi, loop e molto altro del linguaggio Java.

Un secondo corso offre invece una panoramica generale di HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Ajax, jQuery, PHP e MySQL, anch’esso per principianti introducendo i concetti base di ciascun linguaggio. Un terzo corso può essere invece considerato un Master in HTML5 in quanto insegna agli utenti come usare video complessi, audio ed animazioni, nonché costruire layout e scrivere il codice partendo da zero: al termine delle 68 lezioni si avrà un’elevata comprensione delle numerose e potenti funzionalità multimediali disponibili con tale linguaggio.

Seguono poi corsi specifici per CSS, Java 8, JavaScript e database SQL: il tutto partendo dalle fondamenta fino ad analizzare argomenti più impegnativi e specifici, dalle basi del linguaggio (stringhe, sintassi, ecc.) alla comprensione di cicli, lavorare con gli array e molto altro ancora.

Tutto il pacchetto, del valore di 531 dollari, ancora per 14 giorni dal momento in cui scriviamo sarà disponibile su StackSocial a 39,99 dollari, circa 30 euro.

Clint Eastwood Gives His Son Some Pretty Awesome Advice
description:
Scott Eastwood is an up-and-coming actor. He's starring alongside Brad Pitt in the upcoming film "Fury," and he'll be the leading man in  "The Longest Ride," a movie adaptation of a Nicholas Sparks novel of the same name.  

But...
content:
Scott Eastwood is an up-and-coming actor. He's starring alongside Brad Pitt in the upcoming film "Fury," and he'll be the leading man in "The Longest Ride," a movie adaptation of a Nicholas Sparks novel of the same name.

But though the dashing 28-year-old is following in dad Clint Eastwood's famous footsteps, he says his father never persuaded him to become a thespian.

Instead, Eastwood told NBC's "Today," his dad was more concerned about what sort of person he'd become.

"[My dad] didn't care what I did," he told the news outlet in a recent interview. "He didn't care if I was a plumber or if I was an actor. He said, 'Whatever you do just do it well, and be humble about it and be a good guy; and tell the truth.'"

Eastwood, who lives in San Diego, California, added that he's also learned how to "be a man" from his film legend dad. Sometimes you just have to "shut up and do the job," he quipped.

Scott Eastwood and his dad, actor/director Clint Eastwood, talk at the after-party for the premiere of Paramount's "Flags Of Our Fathers" at the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences on October 9, 2006 in Beverly Hills, California.

This isn't the first time that the young actor, the fourth of the elder Eastwood's seven children, has dished on his dad's words of wisdom.

"As a director and an actor, my dad's motto is 'Tell the truth,'" Eastwood told Town & Country last year. "The only way of doing that is having life experiences and being a storyteller."

He added that he hopes to be "a no-bullshit leading man," just like his famous father.

Travel the Road - Antarctica on Exposure
description: The first expedition to reach the South Pole was led by the Norwegian explorer Roald Amundsen.  He and four others arrived at the pole on 14 December 1911, which was five weeks ahead of a British party led by Robert Falcon Scott as part of the Terra Nova Expedition.  Amundsen and his team would return safely to their base, and later learn that Scott and his four companions had died on their return journey.Will Decker stands in an isolated bay on the continent of Antarctica.

name: Stand with Sanju
description: GoodWeave.org/Sanju. Child servitude is a crime committed against 168 million children worldwide. Stand With Sanju demonstrates what an important role consum...
content:
GoodWeave.org/Sanju.

Child servitude is a crime committed against 168 million children worldwide. Stand With Sanju demonstrates what an important role consumers play in making a difference. By using a rigorous and internationally recognized certification program, GoodWeave certifies carpet supply chains as being free of child labor. Additionally, they provide support for children like Sanju who have been rescued.

With your help, we can end child labor by 2020. Be a part of the movement. Take action now. #StandWithSanju

name: Health workers death toll mounts in W.Africa as Ebola spreads
description: Nigeria's health minister will hold an emergency meeting of state health commissioners on Monday as West Africa struggles to halt the deadly Ebola virus, amid growing concern at the toll among healthcare workers. Nigeria on Sunday confirmed a fresh case of Ebola in a doctor whose husband died from the virus, adding to a growing list of those providing healthcare in West Africa to be hit by the epidemic. The woman's husband was also a doctor who died in the city of Port Harcourt on August 22 after treating a patient who had contact with the Liberian man who brought the virus to Nigeria in late July. She was in a stable condition at an isolation unit in the financial capital, Lagos, said Sampson Parker, the health commissioner of Rivers State, of which Port Harcourt is the capital.

name: Google Street View car captures motorcyclist crashing into vehicle before speeding off
description: Camera car on busy Brazilian road records young driver's collision and getaway for the world to see
content:
Â 

If you're using the internet to take a digital walk through Blumenau in Brazil, you might get a shock - because a Google Street View car has captured a dramatic crash.

The car, fitted with a special camera, was cruising along a busy road in the city earlier this year when a motorcyclist crashed right in front of it.

Naturally, it captured the carnage frame-by-fame.

In the snaps, the man, in shorts and a T-shirt, over takes the online mapping car.

As he approaches the car in front he tries to squeeze past it, but clips the vehicle and falls off.

The bike ends up in the path of a Volkswagen Polo, but luckily the motorcyclist avoids being hit by passing traffic.

He is then seen turning to run back to the bike, with the Polo swerving around as the Google car edges closer and a passerby looks on from the pavement.

Uninjured, the red-faced youngster gets back on his bike and speeds off in the bus lane.

Poll loading …
Â
